1530451214_12rREqqdMUPsAPuMR1p87Zj8TS4Yo.body:
Humbly, I think it's a result of a habit. 
So this guy who can't find a girlfriend gets some form of positive feedback from a guy. This starts a cascade where it leads to spending more time together, and then eventually sex. But as i said, it's a habit of receiving positive feedback and then getting used to having that around. 
Just a thought.
